        Parameters:
        name - - Name the user has entered
        password - - Password the user has entered

        Parameters:

      • queryForUser

        public static boolean queryForUser(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String password)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Executed from Server.run(), Checks to see if the Username + Password match an already Registered user when someone tries to Login
        Parameters:
        name - - Name the user has entered
        password - - Password the user has entered
        Returns:
        found Returns a boolean if the user was found or not
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws SQLException

      • insertWarSave

        public static void insertWarSave(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String fileName,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime timeStamp)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Executed from the runGame() method, Inserts a new users save of the Gamestate into the [WAR_SAVES] table
        Parameters:
        name - - Name of the current Logged in User
        fileName - - The file that all the players hands will be saved in, these are always unique files for each save
        timeStamp - - The exact time and date the save was created by the user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws SQLException

      • queryWarSaves

        public static java.lang.String queryWarSaves(java.lang.String playerName)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks to see if there are saves in the databse from the specific Player, returns them if there is.
        Parameters:
        playerName - - Name of the current Logged in User
        Returns:
        Returns all the saves that are found that were saved by the specific playerName
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws SQLException

      • loadSave

        public static java.lang.String loadSave(java.lang.String gameTable,
                                        int saveId,
                                        java.lang.String playerName)
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Provides the user with the specific Save file they're looking for so they may continue where they left off.
        Parameters:
        gameTable - - Whatever game the user is looking to load from
        saveId - - Unique Save ID that they will use to reference the save
        playerName - - Name of the current Logged in User
        Returns:
        Returns the save file the User has selected to Load in
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws SQLException
